评论概述: Not a lot of guidance on sizing so I took a guess... slightly too big but manageable...
评论详情: I really liked the look of these jeans and I liked the price enough to take a risk on sizing even though there wasn't a ton of clarity on the size chart.  For reference, I am about 6'2" tall, weigh about 185lbs, and normally wear a 32x32 size from Levi's, Dickies, and pretty much every major USA brand of pants. Looking at the size chart and with no other guaranteed reference, I guessed the size marked "32" on the left side would get me close if the rest of the measurements corresponded with where I thought they would and, indeed, for the most part, the chart matched. But the 32 (which corresponds to the XX Large size in the menu at time of purchase) is actually closer to a 34 in the waist band. It's not a huge size difference and with a belt it's a non-issue at least for me (and I imagine if you are a "tuck your shirt in" kind of person the extra room may be welcome).  But since these are stretchy you could, and I would personally, go one size smaller. I'm probably going to order a second pair one size down that way I'm covered for the fit I want now and then if I get fatter in the future I have a back up.  The fabric is soft and stretchy, they don't feel super heavy duty or anything but seem sturdy enough. They are easy to put on/take off thanks to the stretch and they move well with your legs. I wouldn't go running around doing the splits in them but I imagine that these are as sturdy as your average pair of jeans from H&M, Target, or JCP.  Also, just a note, the frayed areas are indeed frayed through and whatever is underneath so if that's an issue for you (IE, you don't want your skin to show through) you'd need to add some backing fabric behind those areas (on the upper thigh). Not a huge issue but something to be aware of because you can't tell in the pictures if it goes through or not.  Overall, pretty happy with this but if the seller sees this review, a diagram for what areas the measurements on the list correspond to on the pants would be much appreciated for future buyers.  Lastly, the shipping time: These ship from China to a warehouse in California which then ships them on to you. It took 16 days to arrive here in the North East part of the USA.
